alert.note: Alert for Colleton; Dorchester (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 23 at 7:00PM EDT until May 23 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF COLLETON AND DORCHESTER COUNTIES... At 659 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Reevesville to near Round O to near Yemassee, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported trees down in eastern Hampton County and western Colleton County. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Walterboro, Saint George, Cottageville, Reevesville, Smoaks, Hendersonville, Round O, Green Pond, Canadys, Ritter and White Hall. This warning includes I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 42 and 82. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
